qualityControl.comment: minGeometryScore: 0-1, measures edge density and detail. minActiveCells: out of 25 grid cells (5Ã—5)

zoomRange.comment: Start zooming in moderately so the first frame has texture

zoomSteps.comment: More steps = more chance of hitting interesting regions

zoomMultiplier.comment: Balanced zoom speed; reduces risk of precision breakdown

generation.comment: Grid resolution when searching for interesting points. Higher = slower but better

rendering.comment: Multiplier for max iterations based on zoom. Higher = more detail but slower

brightness.comment: Controls color brightness variation. Lower frequency = less grainy

paletteMapping.comment: How colors cycle: 'modulo' (repeat), 'clamp' (stop at end), 'reflect' (bounce back)

antiGrain.comment: Smooths out grainy high-complexity areas by blending with neighbors

regionWeights.comment: Adjust these to prefer certain region types. 0 = never pick, 2.0 = twice as likely

paletteWeights.comment: Same for palettes. Categorize your palettes and adjust weights

diversity.comment: Remember last N regions and avoid them for variety
